00017 /* Codes for vml?Error function call and errstatus */
00018 #define VML_STATUS_OK                    0
00019 #define VML_STATUS_BADSIZE              -1
00020 #define VML_STATUS_BADMEM               -2
00021 #define VML_STATUS_ERRDOM                1
00022 #define VML_STATUS_SING                  2
00023 #define VML_STATUS_OVERFLOW              3
00024 #define VML_STATUS_UNDERFLOW             4
00025 
00026 /* Mask for standard error handler modes separation*/
00027 #define VML_ERRMODE_STDHANDLER_MASK       0x0f00
00028 /* Mask for additional callback switch bit separation */
00029 #define VML_ERRMODE_CALLBACK_MASK         0xf000
00030 
00031 /* Type for error context structure (parameter for additional callback) */
00032 typedef struct _DefVmlErrorContext
00033 { 
00034     int iCode; 
00035     int iIndex;
00036     double dbA1;
00037     double dbA2;
00038     double dbR1;
00039     double dbR2;
00040     char cFuncName[64];
00041     int  iFuncNameLen;
00042 } DefVmlErrorContext;
00043 
00044 /* Additional callback error handler function type */
00045 typedef int (__stdcall *VMLErrorCallBack)  \
00046 (DefVmlErrorContext* pdefVmlErrorContext);
